titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Formulations of Tralkoxydim.
To suspend temporarily the duty on Formulations of Tralkoxydim.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Formulations of Tralkoxydim which include Tralkoxydim Technical 2-Cyclohexen-1-one,2-[1-(ethoxyimino)propyl]-3-hydroxy-5(2,4,6-trimethylphenyl)-(9C1).
